# Suparank - Complete Content Map for AI Systems

> AI-powered SEO content automation platform. Suparank connects AI assistants (Claude, ChatGPT, Cursor) to professional SEO workflows via Model Context Protocol (MCP).

Last updated: 2026-01-14

---

## About Suparank

Suparank is a SaaS tool that enables AI assistants to execute end-to-end SEO content workflows. Users run `npx suparank` in their terminal, which launches an MCP server connecting their AI client to 19 specialized tools for keyword research, content writing, optimization, and CMS publishing.

**Core Value Proposition:**
- Transform AI chat into a complete content production system
- No context switching between research, writing, and publishing tools
- Professional SEO workflows accessible to solo founders and small teams
- Local-first architecture: CMS credentials never leave the user's machine

**Target Audience:** SaaS founders, indie hackers, content marketers, SEO professionals, and solo creators who want to scale content production with AI assistance.

---

## Main Pages

### Homepage (/)
**URL:** https://suparank.io
**Purpose:** Primary landing page showcasing product value, features, pricing, and social proof.
**Key Sections:**
- Hero: "AI-Powered SEO Content Automation" value proposition
- Features: 19 MCP tools overview (research, writing, optimization, publishing)
<!-- - Testimonials: User success stories and quotes (coming soon) -->
- Pricing: Transparent tier information
- FAQ: Common questions about MCP, setup, and capabilities
**Topics Covered:** MCP integration, content automation, WordPress/Ghost publishing, AI SEO workflows

### Blog Hub (/blog)
**URL:** https://suparank.io/blog
**Purpose:** Content hub with 31 SEO-optimized articles across 5 categories
**Categories:** SEO, Content Strategy, Technical SEO, Case Studies, Product Updates
**Semantic Focus:** AI content creation, SEO optimization, content marketing automation, topical authority building

### Contact (/contact)
**URL:** https://suparank.io/contact
**Purpose:** Contact form and support information
**Contact Methods:** Form submission, email (hello@suparank.io), Twitter (@suparankHQ)
**Response Time:** 24-48 hours

### Changelog (/changelog)
**URL:** https://suparank.io/changelog
**Purpose:** Product version history and feature releases
**Current Version:** 1.0.0 (January 2026)
**Key Features Released:** 19 MCP tools, WordPress integration, Ghost integration, brand voice training, content calendar, image generation

### Terms of Service (/terms)
**URL:** https://suparank.io/terms
**Purpose:** Legal terms governing platform usage
**Key Points:** SaaS subscription model, API key security, content ownership (users retain rights), local credential storage

### Privacy Policy (/privacy)
**URL:** https://suparank.io/privacy
**Purpose:** Data collection and protection policies
**Key Points:** Local-first credentials (never sent to servers), SHA-256 API key hashing, Supabase RLS, GDPR-aligned user rights

---

## Blog Content by Category

### SEO (10 articles)

#### AI SEO Content: How to Rank with Generated Articles in 2026
**URL:** https://suparank.io/blog/ai-seo-content-how-to-rank-2026
**Summary:** Clarifies Google's stance on AI content (quality matters, not origin) and provides E-E-A-T implementation strategies with case studies proving AI-assisted content achieves top rankings when combined with human expertise.
**Keywords:** AI SEO, E-E-A-T, Google guidelines, AI content ranking

#### AI Search Engine Ranking Factors 2026
**URL:** https://suparank.io/blog/ai-search-ranking-factors-2026
**Summary:** Data-backed analysis of platform-specific ranking factors across ChatGPT, Perplexity, Google SGE, and Claude. Reveals content freshness and data-rich content matter more than backlinks for AI search visibility.
**Keywords:** AI search ranking, ChatGPT SEO, Perplexity optimization, Google SGE

#### Building Topical Authority Fast
**URL:** https://suparank.io/blog/build-topical-authority-fast
**Summary:** Demonstrates how to build topical authority in 6-8 weeks using AI to create pillar pages and 20-30 cluster articles with strategic internal linking (vs. 12-18 months traditionally).
**Keywords:** topical authority, content clusters, pillar pages, semantic SEO

#### Perplexity SEO: How to Get Cited
**URL:** https://suparank.io/blog/perplexity-seo-get-cited
**Summary:** Targeted strategies for ranking in Perplexity AI answers, focusing on citation frequency, content recency, and third-party validation.
**Keywords:** Perplexity SEO, AI citations, answer engine optimization

#### Optimize Content for ChatGPT
**URL:** https://suparank.io/blog/optimize-content-for-chatgpt
**Summary:** ChatGPT-specific optimization strategies focusing on domain authority, answer capsules, and third-party mentions for citation in ChatGPT responses.
**Keywords:** ChatGPT optimization, AI search, content ranking

#### GEO for SaaS
**URL:** https://suparank.io/blog/geo-for-saas
**Summary:** Generative Engine Optimization strategies specifically for SaaS companies to achieve citations in ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Google SGE responses.
**Keywords:** GEO, generative engine optimization, SaaS marketing

#### GEO vs SEO Differences
**URL:** https://suparank.io/blog/geo-vs-seo-differences
**Summary:** Contrasts traditional SEO with Generative Engine Optimization, explaining why both matter as AI and traditional search coexist in 2026.
**Keywords:** GEO vs SEO, search optimization, AI search strategy

#### Best AI Content Generators for SaaS Founders 2026
**URL:** https://suparank.io/blog/best-ai-content-generators-saas-founders-2026
**Summary:** Compares 7 AI content generation tools (Jasper, Writesonic, Copy.ai, Frase, Rytr, Suparank, Junia AI) with features, pricing, and optimal use cases for SaaS teams.
**Keywords:** AI content generators, SaaS tools, content marketing tools

#### Best AI Content Tools for WordPress
**URL:** https://suparank.io/blog/ai-content-tools-wordpress
**Summary:** Evaluates 8 WordPress AI plugins (AI Engine, WriteRush, AIOSEO, Rank Math, SeedProd, Jetpack, GetGenie, Divi) with implementation tutorials and cost analysis.
**Keywords:** WordPress AI plugins, content automation, WordPress SEO

#### Claude vs ChatGPT for SEO Content
**URL:** https://suparank.io/blog/claude-vs-chatgpt-seo-content
**Summary:** Detailed comparison of Claude and ChatGPT for SEO content writing, analyzing strengths, weaknesses, and optimal use cases for each AI model.
**Keywords:** Claude vs ChatGPT, AI writing comparison, SEO content

---

## Free SEO Tools

Suparank offers 11 free SEO audit tools that run directly in AI coding assistants like Claude Code, Cursor, and OpenCode. These tools analyze your codebase and provide actionable SEO recommendations with line numbers.

### Installation

```bash
curl -fsSL https://suparank.io/install | bash
```

This installs slash commands to `~/.claude/commands/` that work in Claude Code and compatible AI assistants.

### Tools Directory

**URL:** https://suparank.io/tools
**Purpose:** Central hub for all free SEO tools with installation instructions and feature overviews.

### Individual Tools

#### Free SEO Audit Tool
**URL:** https://suparank.io/tools/full-seo-audit
**Command:** `/suparank-full`
**Purpose:** Comprehensive 50+ point SEO audit covering on-page, technical, accessibility, and content factors.
**Features:** Meta tags, heading structure, Core Web Vitals, Schema.org, internal links, image optimization, mobile-friendliness, security headers.
**Output:** Scored report with prioritized recommendations and line numbers for each issue.

#### On-Page SEO Checker
**URL:** https://suparank.io/tools/on-page-seo-checker
**Command:** `/suparank-onpage`
**Purpose:** Analyze title tags, meta descriptions, heading structure, keyword density, and internal links.
**Features:** Title tag length validation (50-60 chars), meta description check (120-160 chars), H1-H6 hierarchy, keyword density (1-2%), image alt text.
**Target Keyword:** on page seo checker (KD 43, 2.9K monthly searches)

#### Website Accessibility Checker
**URL:** https://suparank.io/tools/accessibility-checker
**Command:** `/suparank-a11y`
**Purpose:** WCAG 2.2 Level AA compliance testing for ADA requirements.
**Features:** Color contrast ratios (4.5:1 minimum), alt text validation, keyboard navigation, ARIA attributes, form labels, focus management.
**Target Keyword:** website accessibility checker (KD 36, 1.3K monthly searches)

#### LLMs.txt Generator
**URL:** https://suparank.io/tools/llms-txt-generator
**Command:** `/suparank-llms`
**Purpose:** Generate AI-friendly llms.txt files for LLM crawlers like ChatGPT, Claude, and Perplexity.
**Features:** Automatic content summarization, semantic structure, proper formatting, link organization.
**Target Keyword:** llms.txt (KD 0, 1.9K monthly searches)

#### Robots.txt Generator
**URL:** https://suparank.io/tools/robots-txt-generator
**Command:** `/suparank-robots`
**Purpose:** Create and validate robots.txt files for search crawler access control.
**Features:** Syntax validation, crawl directive testing, sitemap references, user-agent rules, common mistake detection.
**Target Keyword:** robots.txt generator (KD 17, 1K monthly searches)

#### Technical SEO Audit Tool
**URL:** https://suparank.io/tools/technical-seo-audit
**Command:** `/suparank-technical`
**Purpose:** Analyze crawlability, indexing, and technical infrastructure.
**Features:** XML sitemap validation, canonical tags, redirect chains, duplicate content, crawl budget optimization, JavaScript rendering.
**Target Keyword:** technical seo audit (KD 55, 4.2K monthly searches)

#### Schema Markup Generator
**URL:** https://suparank.io/tools/schema-markup-generator
**Command:** `/suparank-schema`
**Purpose:** Generate JSON-LD structured data for rich snippets in search results.
**Features:** Article, Product, FAQ, HowTo, Organization, LocalBusiness, BreadcrumbList schemas with validation.
**Target Keyword:** schema markup generator (KD 67, 1.4K monthly searches)

#### Core Web Vitals Checker
**URL:** https://suparank.io/tools/core-web-vitals-checker
**Command:** `/suparank-cwv`
**Purpose:** Analyze LCP, INP, and CLS metrics for page experience optimization.
**Features:** Largest Contentful Paint analysis, Interaction to Next Paint, Cumulative Layout Shift, performance budgets.
**Target Keyword:** core web vitals checker (KD 30, 500 monthly searches)

#### Meta Tag Generator
**URL:** https://suparank.io/tools/meta-tag-generator
**Command:** `/suparank-meta`
**Purpose:** Generate optimized title tags, Open Graph, and Twitter Card meta tags.
**Features:** Character limit validation, social preview generation, duplicate detection, canonical URL suggestions.
**Target Keyword:** meta tag generator (KD 36, 450 monthly searches)

#### Internal Link Checker
**URL:** https://suparank.io/tools/internal-link-checker
**Command:** `/suparank-links`
**Purpose:** Analyze internal linking structure and identify optimization opportunities.
**Features:** Broken link detection, anchor text analysis, link equity distribution, orphan page identification, crawl depth mapping.
**Target Keyword:** internal link checker (KD 13, 400 monthly searches)

#### Image Alt Text Checker
**URL:** https://suparank.io/tools/alt-text-checker
**Command:** `/suparank-images`
**Purpose:** Audit image accessibility and SEO optimization.
**Features:** Missing alt text detection, generic alt text warnings, file name analysis, lazy loading validation, modern format recommendations.
**Target Keyword:** alt text checker (KD 10, 100 monthly searches)

### Supported Platforms

All tools work in:
- Claude Code (claude.ai/code)
- Cursor IDE
- OpenCode
- Codex
- Any MCP-compatible AI assistant

---

## Product Information

### 19 MCP Tools

**Research Tools:**
- `keyword_research`: Discover keywords with volume, difficulty, intent
- `seo_strategy`: Generate comprehensive SEO briefs
- `topical_map`: Plan pillar-cluster content architecture
- `content_calendar`: Create editorial schedules

**Content Creation:**
- `content_write`: Generate SEO-optimized articles
- `image_prompt`: Create AI image generation prompts
- `generate_image`: Generate images via fal.ai

**Optimization:**
- `internal_links`: Plan internal linking strategy
- `schema_generate`: Create JSON-LD structured data
- `geo_optimize`: Optimize for AI search engines
- `quality_check`: Pre-publish quality assurance

**Workflow:**
- `full_pipeline`: Complete 5-phase content pipeline
- `create_content`: Primary content creation workflow

**Session Management:**
- `save_content`: Save articles to session
- `get_session`: View session status
- `publish_content`: Publish to CMS

**Publishing:**
- `publish_wordpress`: Direct WordPress publishing
- `publish_ghost`: Direct Ghost CMS publishing
- `send_webhook`: Trigger automation webhooks

### Technical Architecture

- **Protocol:** Model Context Protocol (MCP) via stdio transport
- **Installation:** `npx suparank setup`
- **Configuration:** `~/.suparank/config.json` (API key, project slug)
- **Credentials:** `~/.suparank/credentials.json` (local CMS keys, never uploaded)
- **Supported Clients:** Claude Desktop, Cursor, ChatGPT

### Pricing Model

Subscription-based SaaS with tiered pricing based on:
- Number of projects
- API call volume
- Advanced features access
